alert-to-stop.title: Servidor in use!
alert-to-stop.message: To perform configurations, it is necessary to stop the execution of the server.

no-execution-permission.title: Warning!
no-execution-permission.message:
Tomcat script files are not allowed to execute!

Run the command "sudo chmod +x *.sh" in the selected Tomcat /bin directory to fix, otherwise the server will not be able to run.

no-tomcat-path.title: Error!
no-tomcat-path.message:
Added path does not match a Tomcat!

Please add a corresponding path.
